name: Carrot
svgString: <svg viewBox='0 0 15 30' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><defs><linearGradient id='carrotGrad' x1='0' y1='0' x2='1' y2='0'><stop offset='0%' stop-color='#ffcc80'/><stop offset='50%' stop-color='orange'/><stop offset='100%' stop-color='#e69500'/></linearGradient></defs><polygon points='0,5 15,5 12,28 3,28' fill='url(#carrotGrad)' stroke='#c60' stroke-width='0.3'/><path d='M 2 10 L 13 10 M 2 15 L 13 15 M 3 20 L 12 20 M 4 25 L 11 25' stroke='#e69500' stroke-width='0.4' opacity='0.6'/><path d='M5 0 Q 7.5 3 10 0 L 12 5 L 3 5 Z' fill='green' stroke='darkgreen' stroke-width='0.3'/></svg>

name: Tomato
svgString: <svg viewBox='0 0 50 50' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><defs><radialGradient id='tomatoGrad' cx='0.3' cy='0.3' r='0.7'><stop offset='0%' stop-color='#ff8080'/><stop offset='100%' stop-color='red'/></radialGradient></defs><rect width='50' height='50' fill='#eee'/><circle cx='25' cy='28' r='20' fill='url(#tomatoGrad)' stroke='darkred' stroke-width='0.5'/><ellipse cx='18' cy='20' rx='5' ry='3' fill='white' opacity='0.3' transform='rotate(-30 18 20)'/><path d='M25,8 C 22,12 18,13 18,18 L 25,14 L 32,18 C 32,13 28,12 25,8 Z' fill='green' stroke='darkgreen' stroke-width='0.5'/></svg>

name: Lettuce
svgString: <svg viewBox='0 0 30 30' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><defs><linearGradient id='lettuceGrad' x1='0' y1='0' x2='0' y2='1'><stop offset='0%' stop-color='#eaffea'/><stop offset='100%' stop-color='lightgreen'/></linearGradient></defs><rect width='30' height='30' fill='#f0fff0'/><path d='M2 28 C 8 12, 22 12, 28 28 C 24 18, 16 18, 15 24 C 14 18, 6 18, 2 28 Z' fill='url(#lettuceGrad)' stroke='#5a5' stroke-width='0.4' filter='url(#lettuceBlur)'/><path d='M5 25 C 10 15, 20 15, 25 25 C 22 20, 18 20, 15 24 C 12 20, 8 20, 5 25 Z' fill='#b0ffb0' stroke='#5a5' stroke-width='0.4' opacity='0.8'/><path d='M8 23 C 12 18, 18 18, 22 23 C 19 21, 16 21, 15 22 C 14 21, 11 21, 8 23 Z' fill='#d0ffd0' opacity='0.6'/></svg>

name: Potato
svgString: <svg viewBox='0 0 40 75' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><defs><radialGradient id='potatoGrad' cx='0.4' cy='0.4' r='0.8'><stop offset='0%' stop-color='#b98c61'/><stop offset='100%' stop-color='#a05a2c'/></radialGradient></defs><rect width='40' height='75' fill='tan'/><ellipse cx='20' cy='37.5' rx='18' ry='35' fill='url(#potatoGrad)' stroke='#5c4033' stroke-width='0.5'/><ellipse cx='15' cy='25' rx='2' ry='1.5' fill='#5c4033' opacity='0.7'/><ellipse cx='28' cy='35' rx='1.5' ry='1' fill='#5c4033' opacity='0.7'/><ellipse cx='20' cy='55' rx='1.8' ry='1.2' fill='#5c4033' opacity='0.7'/></svg>
